controllers

Class RetrieveExpenseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.RetrieveExpenseController

  • @RestController
public class RetrieveExpenseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller used to retrieve expenses by various different means.
    Author:
    Aran

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RetrieveExpenseController()
      Initialises an instance of the ExpenseRetrievalService used for retrieving expense information from the DB and the filesystem.

    • Method Detail

      • userExpenseRetrieval

        @RequestMapping(value="/userExpenseRetrieval",
                method=POST)
public ExpenseRetrievalResponse userExpenseRetrieval(@RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String password)
        Used to get expenses according to a user's email, given that the credentials are valid.
        Parameters:
        email - A valid user email.
        password - A valid user's password.
        Returns:
        ExpenseRetrievalResponse containing all of the user's expenses, if the credentials submitted were valid. Will not return the user's expenses if the credentials were wrong. Will return exceptions in the webservice if something went wrong upon trying to retrieve user expenses.
